channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bank, cell records led FBI to suspect in Jan. 6 eve pipe bomb case
item.description: The FBI on Thursday arrested a suspect who investigators said planted pipe bombs near the Republican and Democratic parties ' headquarters in Washingt...

item.title: Trump ally Pulte under investigation by congressional watchdog
item.description: The Government Accountability Office (GAO) confirmed Thursday it opened a probe into Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA) director Bill Pulte , amid ...

item.title: Trump plans to announce Gaza government, Board of Peace by Christmas, officials say
item.description: President Trump plans to announce before Christmas that the Gaza peace process is moving into its second phase and to unveil the new governance struct...

item.title: Hegseth in the hot seat as Venezuela strike spurs congressional calls for transparency
item.description: Lawmakers are demanding the Pentagon release additional documents and details on a second strike in the Caribbean that killed shipwrecked survivors on...

item.title: Signalgate report finds Hegseth potentially put U.S. forces at risk
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth put U.S. operations and troops at risk during a strike in Yemen by sending sensitive information to a Signal groupchat ...

item.title: ‘Signalgate’ report contradicts Hegseth’s claim of ‘total exoneration’
item.description: The defense secretary’s actions “created a risk to operational security,” according to an independent assessment by the Pentagon’s inspector general.

item.title: Navy deployment marred by friendly fire, lost jets, collision at sea
item.description: The Truman aircraft carrier group conducted airstrikes for 52 days straight. Investigators found that not all of its ships or crews were ready for suc...

item.title: The renamed ‘Donald J. Trump Institute of Peace’ hosts first event
item.description: Trump joined leaders from Rwanda and the Democratic Republic of Congo to sign an accord — and to marvel at the new name his administration gave the bu...

item.title: Trump hires new White House ballroom architect
item.description: Although the two had clashed over the size of the project, the decisive factor was the small firm’s limited capacity to handle such an enormous projec...

item.title: Democratic congressman: ‘Troubling’ boat strike video shows survivors in ‘distress’
item.description: Adm. Frank M. Bradley is attending meetings with lawmakers after an attack on alleged drug smugglers included a follow-up strike that killed two survi...

item.title: White House bullish on economic growth as Thanksgiving spending rises
item.description: Economic adviser Kevin Hassett dismissed economic bedwetters, saying strong spending bodes well for the economy.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
